[Jenkins Ubuntu problem](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/302/console):
~~~
CMake Error at cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake:304 (include):
  include called with wrong number of arguments.  Include only takes one
  file.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:149 (include)


-- checking for module 'libavformat'
--   found libavformat, version 53.21.1
CMake Error at cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake:314 (include):
  include called with wrong number of arguments.  Include only takes one
  file.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:149 (include)


-- checking for module 'libavcodec'
--   found libavcodec, version 53.35.0
CMake Error at cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake:324 (include):
  include called with wrong number of arguments.  Include only takes one
  file.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:149 (include)
